requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3Ghz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 7 Series or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Full Controller Support
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4 Ghz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 9 Series or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Full Controller Support
